did.unittitle: ABC Circle Films production records for the mini-series War and Remembrance
did.abstract: Based on Herman Wouk's novel, the television mini-series War and Remembrance is the story of WWII and its effects on Navy officer Pug Henry and his family. The collection consists of production records and research files related to the production.

bioghist.head: Biography/History
bioghist.p: Based on Herman Wouk's novel, the television mini-series War and Remembrance is the story of WWII and its effects on Navy officer Pug Henry and his family. The 7 part series was co-produced by ABC Circle Films and Dan Curtis Productions, was produced by Barbara Steele, and co-written by Earl W. Wallace, Herman Wouk, and Dan Curtis.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of production records and research files related to the television mini-series, War and Remembrance. Includes script material, location photographs, story boards, production files, shooting schedules, budget information, and historical research files.

arrangement.p: There is no specific arrangement to the collection.
